Donald Rumsfeld 's paper was given to the White House only two weeks after President Bush had approved a US military operation in Afghanistan directed against Osama bin Laden and the Taliban regime. Despite that decision, Donald Rumsfeld 's proposal called explicitly for postponing indefinitely US airstrikes and the use of ground forces in support of the anti-Taliban Northern Alliance in order to try to catch Osama bin Laden . the Donald Rumsfeld paper argued that the US should target states that had supported anti-Israel forces such as Hezbollah and Hamas. Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection is secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still smoldering NDP headquarters.
